review_data.title: Awesome
review_data.content: Fantastic variety of cheese fondue. The classic and the bacon garlic are especially good. Staff are very friendly. If you want meat fondue you need to order in advance. At the end, the chocolate fondue is a must!

review_data.title: Great Fondue and great service!!!
review_data.content: Simply great! The service was amazingly friendly and attentive! The atmosphere is very cozy and in combination with the great service the place is just too cute to leave at the end if the visit!!! Highly recommended!!!
